DOC.brief_summary: A total 1,180 woman diagnose Gestational Diabetes Mellitus ( GDM ) 2005 2009 continue randomly assign either intervention group control group . GDM woman intervention group five consulting session dietician first year two session second year . The intervention group give detailed advice achieve six goal intervention . The primary aim test whether lifestyle intervention reduce incident Type 2 Diabetes ( T2D ) woman prior GDM . The second aim test gene-intervention interaction fine-mapping establish gene glucose , IR , lipid , obesity T2D relation metabolic traits T2D GDM woman .
DOC.brief_title: Tianjin Gestational Diabetes Prevention Program ( TGDPP )

Currently pregnant , plan become pregnant next four year
